resources.string: Sugar is a 5 year old male gray cat who loves long naps, head scratches and watching fish in the aquarium. He may seem grumpy at first, but is actually rather sweet.
Fluffy is a 2 year old female white dog who loves being around her owner, playing with a ball and getting belly rubs. She is really joyful and friendly.
Twinkle is a 6 months old black-and-white bunny who loves eating carrots, hopping around and chewing on things that are not meant to be chewed.
